name: places/ChIJQT4UYahZwokRRYQl8RplkBw
formattedAddress: 20 E 42nd St 2nd floor, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 20 E 42nd St 2nd floor, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Perfectionists!  This lovely, high-end salon gives you beautiful lashes, along with amazing customer service. From the front desk to your salon chair, you are met with friendly service. My eyelash technician, Jasmine, is a talented stylist who I consider to be a master stylist. Her technique is flawless and her work, very professional.  I arrived wearing skimpy eyelash extensions from a different local nail salon that were lackluster, Jasmine worked with me for a new install. Her technique is so good that the lashes feel like I'm wearing nothing at all. They are full, dark, fluffy and stunning. I'm new to eyelash extensions and I am so, so happy to have found this salon. This has changed the morning make-up routine entirely. No more falsies...yay! The additional after care products are also a plus. I've already scheduled my next install and will not go anywhere else. A huge thank you to the entire team!

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Envious Lashes for about 4 years now and have always had such a great experience. My lashes look incredible every time! I went to Clem today, and my lashes look great. Love it here and I’ve referred several friends! Highly recommend.

text.text: I’ve been going to Envious Lashes for about 4 years now and have always had such a great experience. My lashes look incredible every time! I went to Clem today, and my lashes look great. Love it here and I’ve referred several friends! Highly recommend.

originalText.text:
I can't say enough wonderful things about Envious Eyelashes and Clem, the owner. From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and at ease. Clem's expertise in eyelash extensions is truly remarkable, and I'm thrilled with the results every time I visit.

The salon is clean, comfortable, and has a relaxing ambiance that adds to the overall experience. Clem takes the time to listen to exactly what I want and provides personalized recommendations to achieve the best results. Her attention to detail is outstanding, and I always leave feeling more confident and beautiful.

Not only is Clem incredibly skilled at her craft, but she's also a delightful person to chat with during the appointment. Her friendly and professional demeanor makes the entire process enjoyable.

I've been a loyal customer of Envious Eyelashes for a while now, and I can't imagine going anywhere else for my eyelash extensions. If you're looking for exceptional service, top-notch skills, and a friendly atmosphere, Envious Eyelashes is the place to go.

Thank you, Clem, for consistently exceeding my expectations and making me feel fabulous every time I leave your salon. I highly recommend Envious Eyelashes to anyone in search of the best eyelash extensions in NYC!

originalText.text: I love Envious Lashes in NYC! I’ve been a customer for 2 years and i wouldn’t trust anyone else with my lashes. Everyone I’ve seen there is amazing. The brow services are wonderful too!

text.text: I love Envious Lashes in NYC! I’ve been a customer for 2 years and i wouldn’t trust anyone else with my lashes. Everyone I’ve seen there is amazing. The brow services are wonderful too!

originalText.text:
They scratched my Cornea during the lash application. I paid $370 with tip and they didn’t want to refund me. Handled my situation very unprofessionally.

The lash tech that did my lashes was very sweet however during the application the process I was wondering why it was very painful especially since I have gotten my extensions many times before at other locations.
After we had finished the extensions my left eye was extremely red. The lash tech said it was from the glue and that I was probably sensitive to it. I took her word for it and waited till the next day. I thought it was odd because only my left eye had pain and had gotten worse the following day. So The next day I went to the Ophthalmologist (eye doctor) and they did a full examination. My Cornea has an abrasion and it happened when the lash tech was applying the lashes by lifting my eye lids.
I called the front envious lash front desk to ask for a refund and they would not refund me and only offered a free removal. She told me that I could have scratched it myself and that they are running a business. Very unprofessional response because that tells you that they care more about their dollars than their clients.
Any business that responds in that manner does not deserve anyone’s dollars. My full set cost me $370 (tip included). Her excuse is as that she already did the service and they spent their time to do it.
As a customer I did not plan to pay for a service to have myself miss work, spend my time to go to the doctors office and pay for antibiotics. The least they could have done was a refund me.

They do not care about their clients.
